thread.title: The Latest: Lamar Odom alert and improving, his aunt says
thread.title_full: The Latest: Lamar Odom alert and improving, his aunt says

title: The Latest: Lamar Odom alert and improving, his aunt says
text:
Jeff Lewis Lamar Odom regains consciousness, family and friends say 
FILE - In this July 31, 2009, file photo, Los Angeles Lakers' Lamar Odom speaks to the media during a news conference after the Lakers signed Odom to a multi-year NBA basketball contract, in El Segundo, Calif. Odom spent most of his 14-year NBA career in Los Angeles with the Lakers and Clippers, becoming a fan favorite before he sought even more fame with the Kardashians. Odom, who was embraced by teammates and television fans alike for his Everyman approach to fame, was found face-down and alone Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, after spending four days at the Love Ranch, a legal Nevada brothel. (AP Photo/Jeff Lewis, File) Mark J. Terrill Lamar Odom regains consciousness, family and friends say 
FILE - In this March 2, 2008, file photo, Los Angeles Lakers forward Lamar Odom reacts to a call during the second half of their NBA basketball game against the Dallas Mavericks, in Los Angeles. Odom spent most of his 14-year NBA career in Los Angeles with the Lakers and Clippers, becoming a fan favorite before he sought even more fame with the Kardashians. Odom, who was embraced by teammates and television fans alike for his Everyman approach to fame, was found face-down and alone Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, after spending four days at the Love Ranch, a legal Nevada brothel.(AP Photo/Mark J. Terrill, File) Posted: Monday, October 19, 2015 10:16 am
